I posted my analysis on an attack on LMD GHOST which can delay the finality for a few hours ~ days by leveraging a network failure: https://ethresear.ch/t/decoy-flip-flop-attack-on-lmd-ghost/6001/1

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content:
<tsudmi> Hi @everyone,

I've created a project (https://github.com/stakewise/shared-validator) which allows multiple entities to share the same validator. The only source of documentation, for now, are README and contracts. More documentation is yet to come. Any feedback is much appreciated. :)

author: djrtwo
content:
Just a heads up the vlaidator API has moved to https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-apis
In this new repo, we aim to conform upon APIs provided by clients
